sql: SELECT MIN(t.title) AS movie_title FROM keyword AS k, movie_info AS mi, movie_keyword AS mk, title AS t WHERE k.keyword  like '%sequel%' AND mi.info  IN ('Bulgaria') AND t.production_year > 2010 AND t.id = mi.movie_id AND t.id = mk.movie_id AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id AND k.id = mk.keyword_id;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(mi t k mk)
 HashJoin(k mk)
 HashJoin(mi t)
 IndexScan(mi)
 TidScan(t)
 IndexScan(k)
 TidScan(mk)
 Leading(((mi t) (k mk))) */
